amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exception to certain provisions of the bill to grandparents of the minor and members of the clergy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-56 to add to the exceptions to the offense of transporting minors for the purpose of obtaining an illegal abortion grandparents of the minor and members of the clergy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 252 (Roll no. 142).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 252 (Roll no. 142).
